EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-03-21-Dallas-Invite.ES-2019-03-28 Dallas Event invite
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} You're Invited, Cool River Cafe 3/28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}!
Join Turbonomic and GDT on March 28th for an exclusive lunch discussion at Cool River Cafe <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cracking-the-code-cool-river-tickets-57423244470]]> about how your company can utilize Automation and Orchestration for applications, hybrid cloud and multi-cloud environments. We’ll examine infrastructures, tools and processes to help design your data center of the future. You’ll learn how to:
- Assure Application performance - Display IT’s value to your entire organization - Bridge the Application-Infrastructure gap - Accelerate Application migration
Space is limited. Register now <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cracking-the-code-cool-river-tickets-57423244470]]> to save your seat!
Sincerely, Team Turbonomic Cracking the Code – Dallas <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cracking-the-code-cool-river-tickets-57423244470]]> Cool River Cafe | 1045 Hidden Ridge, Irvine TX
Thursday, March 28, 2019 | 11:00 AM
